name: Escape From Motherboard City
description:
it's a flappy bird clone made for the Ouya console as an exercise in learning Godot for Ouya development and orchestrating a finished project (you can also play it on windows and linux)

millie (@Atatra_Millie) - concept, graphics
maple "mavica" syrup (@maplesbian) - programming, music

it's simple, it's dumb, it's jank, it's a new ouya game in 2022

visit ouya.world and ouya.cweiske.de for information on sideloading the apk onto your ouya
